criticism: The increaseApproval function lacks checks to prevent integer overflow, which can be exploited by the owner to increase the balance of an arbitrary spender.
The decreaseApproval function lacks checks to prevent integer overflow, which can be exploited by the owner to decrease the balance of an arbitrary spender.
The mint function lacks checks to prevent integer overflow, which can be exploited by the owner to create a new token for a given buyer.
The pullBack function lacks checks to prevent integer overflow, which can be exploited by the owner to retrieve a specific amount of tokens from a given buyer.
The showMyTokenBalance function lacks checks to prevent integer overflow, which can be exploited by the owner to display the balance of a given token holder.
